title: LLM Tests Configuration
description: Configuration for HeyGen MCP LLM tests using agent-benchmark

agentBenchmarkPath.description: Path to agent-benchmark executable or source directory. If null, looks in system PATH.

agentBenchmarkMode.description: How to run agent-benchmark: 'executable' uses compiled binary, 'go-run' uses 'go run .' from source

serverCommand.description: Command to start the HeyGen MCP server. If null, uses 'uv run python -m heygen_mcp.server'
